name: Super Mega Spaceship
description:
An evil super mega alien spaceship has brought havoc in your city. As the last survivor you must put down this abomination before it destroys the rest of the world. Do you have what it takes?

Controls:

A; S = Move left and right

W = Jump

Mouse Cursor: Aim

Left Mouse Button (Hold): Fire assault rifle and shotgun

Left Mouse Button (Tap): Fire pulse rifle

Left Mouse Button (Hold Till Flashing): Fire charged shot for pulse rifle
